version_description:
Thank you for using the illico app.

Based on your feedback, this update includes performance improvements and further stability tweaks.

New: with illico Cloud, your profile is accessible on all the illico apps and on illico.tv. Keep the content you love right at your fingertips, no matter where you go.

Tip: if you want, you can update the app automatically by going to Settings > iTunes & App Store > Automatic Downloads, and clicking on Updates.

Thank you for using the illico app.

Based on your feedback, this update includes performance improvements and further stability tweaks.

Tip: if you want, you can update the app automatically by going to Settings > iTunes & App Store > Automatic Downloads and clicking on Updates.

Version 3.1: Minor bug fixes on iOS10

New!
Club illico is now available for your mobile phone!
Send content from your mobile phone to your TV.
The new section "My illico" allows you to personalize your content.
Use your mobile phone as a second remote control.

Version 3.1: Minor bug fixes on iOS10

New!
Club illico is now available for your mobile phone!
Send content from your mobile phone to your TV.
The new section "My illico" allows you to personalize your content.
Use your mobile phone as a second remote control.

Improved viewing experience.
It is now easier than ever to choose how you want to watch your live or on demand content.

We have also fixed more bugs.

Happy viewing!

Improved viewing experience.
It is now easier than ever to choose how you want to watch your live or on demand content.

We have also fixed more bugs.

Happy viewing!

• Airplay functionality is now available directly from the video player for eligible content. Use the Airplay icon to cast to your Apple TV.
• Improved app stability while streaming a video.

• Airplay functionality is now available directly from the video player for eligible content. Use the Airplay icon to cast to your Apple TV.
• Improved app stability while streaming a video.

• Introducing "My Mobile Content", a new section where you'll find all of your favorite titles available on your device.
• Many UI improvements and bug fixes for a better experience.

• Introducing "My Mobile Content", a new section where you'll find all of your favorite titles available on your device.
• Many UI improvements and bug fixes for a better experience.

We redesigned the app to improve the viewing experience for series.
• Addicted to your series on illico? You can now binge-watch them with the new auto-play feature.
• You can also tap on the + during video playback to show useful information about the episode now being played.

We redesigned the app to improve the viewing experience for series.
• Addicted to your series on illico? You can now binge-watch them with the new auto-play feature.
• You can also tap on the + during video playback to show useful information about the episode now being played.

• Subtitles are now available for most VOD titles.
• Look for the subtitles icon to activate them.

• Subtitles are now available for most VOD titles.
• Look for the subtitles icon to activate them.
• A new simplified user interface for Club illico mobile
• A new simplified user interface for Club illico mobile

• A new simplified user interface for Club illico mobile.
• Bug fixes and stability improvements.

• A new simplified user interface for Club illico mobile.
• Bug fixes and stability improvements.

Better Chromecast devices v1 support
Bug fixes and stability improvements.

Bug fixes and stability improvements.
This update brings minor technical improvements, bug fixes and updated video components for the app.

This update brings minor technical improvements, bug fixes and fixes various issues related to iOS 14.
